Advanced data
Item ID23185

The ring of 3rd age can be obtained as a drop from The Mimic. It can change the model of the player to look like various 3rd age equipment.

While this effect is active, the player cannot move, or it will end. If another player right clicks on the image of the equipment, the normal options will appear (i.e. "Walk here Username", "Follow Username", etc.)

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Defence bonuses
+0+0+0+0+0
 Other bonusesSlot
+0+0+0%+0List

The following items can be transformed into:

Keybind Item Keybind Item
1. 3rd age wand D. 3rd age platebody
2. 3rd age bow E. 3rd age plateskirt
3. 3rd age longsword F. 3rd age platelegs
4. 3rd age cloak G. 3rd age full helmet
5. 3rd age range top H. 3rd age kiteshield
6. 3rd age range legs I. 3rd age druidic robe top
7. 3rd age range coif J. 3rd age druidic robe bottoms
8. 3rd age vambraces K. 3rd age druidic staff
9. 3rd age robe top L. 3rd age druidic cloak
A. 3rd age robe M. 3rd age axe
B. 3rd age mage hat N. 3rd age pickaxe
C. 3rd age amulet O. Ring of 3rd age

Item sources[edit | edit source]

For an exhaustive list of all known sources for this item, see here (include RDT).
SourceLevelQuantityRarity
Reward casket (elite) Mimic bonusN/A 11/44
Reward casket (master) Mimic bonusN/A 11/40
The Mimic186 11/40; 1/44

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
25 April 2019
(update)

The click zone for the ring's transmogrifications are now substantially larger no matter the item selected, and can once again be used in PvP areas.

18 April 2019
(update)

The ring has been disabled for use in the Wilderness due to an exploit that prevented players from attacking opponents who stood under a transformed player.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • While the items that the ring can transform players into are members items, the ring is available for free-to-play players.

[[File:Ring of 3rd age detail.png|left|140px]]
The '''ring of 3rd age''' can be obtained as a drop from [[The Mimic]]. It can change the model of the player to look like various [[3rd age equipment]].

While this effect is active, the player cannot move, or it will end. If another player right clicks on the image of the equipment, the normal options will appear (i.e. "Walk here Username", "Follow Username", etc.)
